channel.title: RuneScorp [Scratch]
channel.description:
[b]Project RuneScorp Ltd.[/b]
RuneScorp Official
About my server [b]Well im fed up of people leeching and using delta bases and they do nothing to except change there name well ive created a silabsoft/delta sever from scratch and it wasn't easy there is a few bugs and stuff but nothing i cant fix thats why ive classed it as (BETA) well anyway thanks for looking[/b]
Compatable Software to Play Silabsoft or Deltascape client (even though its not delta its really stable but soon im releasing for skillcapes and so on)
Latest Update [b]Skillcapes and Silabsoft compatable skillcapes and other armours talk to market seller[/b]
Is Currently in Beta Stage With new updates happening every day now i want to make this server good and its good to start a fresh new project but anyway im hosting for the public now to play as obviously it is playable and there is a decent amount of features to offer even though it is on BETA stage.
[b]Features of RuneScorp Basic Pvp System Magic on Npc Magic on Player Range on Npc Range on Player Barrows Thieving Base All Specials (inc. Dfs) Alching Perfect [/B]
[b]The Village Of RuneScorp[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/1z6sdcp.jpg[/img]
[b]Pick your Flax[/b] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z4ld8j.jpg[/img]
[b]Spin your Flax and gain Crafting[/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/a07wo0.jpg[/img]
[b]Thieving[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2i7v7ma.jpg[/img]
[b]Chop Those Trees for either firemaking or fletching or even sell them[/b] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/20gmr9s.jpg[/imh]
[b]Alch your items train magic[/b] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/dea7wl.jpg[/img]
[b]Duel Your Apponents and Claim Your Prize[/b] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/zxws4n.jpg[/img]
[b]Brand New Banking In new village[/b] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/e5oj9v.jpg[/img]

item.title: RuneScorp [Scratch]
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

Project RuneScorp Ltd.

RuneScorp Official

About my server
Well im fed up of people leeching and using delta bases and they do nothing to except change there name well ive created a silabsoft/delta sever from scratch and it wasn’t easy there is a few bugs and stuff but nothing i cant fix thats why ive classed it as (BETA) well anyway thanks for looking

Compatable Software to Play
Silabsoft or Deltascape client (even though its not delta its really stable but soon im releasing for skillcapes and so on)

Latest Update
Skillcapes and Silabsoft compatable skillcapes and other armours talk to market seller

Is Currently in Beta Stage With new updates happening every day now i want to make this server good and its good to start a fresh new project but anyway im hosting for the public now to play as obviously it is playable and there is a decent amount of features to offer even though it is on BETA stage.

Features of RuneScorp
Basic Pvp System
Magic on Npc
Magic on Player
Range on Npc
Range on Player
Barrows
Thieving Base
All Specials (inc. Dfs)
Alching Perfect

The Village Of RuneScorp

Pick your Flax

Spin your Flax and gain Crafting

Thieving

Chop Those Trees for either firemaking or fletching or even sell them
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/20gmr9s.jpg[/imh]

Alch your items train magic

Duel Your Apponents and Claim Your Prize

Brand New Banking In new village
